title: Talking Back - author develops simile primarily

content.question: The author develops a simile in Paragraph 6 primarily to

choices.label: demonstrate the type of household chore she must attend to
emphasize the need to contextualize domestic life within the world at large
present an activity that the reader can easily picture

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
